caption: Trace
description: The Trace object defines the asocaited attributes for a trace.
name: trace

trace_type.description: Identifier for the trace type, linking related events.

span_id.description: Spans represent specific operations in and between systems and is defined by https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/general/trace/.

span_name.description: The OTeL span name, as defined by the span_id.

desc.description: Explanation or additional context about the trace type.
